name: wasplanning
description: A real-time vehicle wash management system for auto service centers, coordinating between workshop, wash station, and planning departments.

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start: npm run services:start && npm run dev
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run migration:run && npm run seed:run
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npm run migration:revert:all && npm run migration:run && npm run seed:run
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:frontend:e2e && npm run test:backend:e2e
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
